name: MEC Centaurus Junior 0C Sleeping Bag - Youths
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
Get younger hikers out for some exploring without spending your entire budget on gear. A scaled-down version of MEC's popular Centaurus bags, this junior-sized version uses quick-drying synthetic insulation for both value and easy care. Designed with thoughtful touches, it will make your nights better and keep your pack slim and light on the hike in.Insulated with synthetic HyperLoft that contains recycled fibres.Outer shell fabric is Pertex Quantum nylon with a DWR treatment to shed moisture. Lining is nylon.Regular size has hood drawcords that are operable with one hand. Small size has no drawcords for safety.3/4-length YKK® zipper helps trim the weight.2 hanging loops on the foot end.Includes a stuff sack and a home storage sack.

        Sustainability
